text: Holy Innocents is on December 28. It remembers the killing of the male children of Bethlehem by Herod, as recorded in the Gospel of Matthew. It is not known exactly when the church began celebrating this event. The first mention of the day dates to the year 485. ==Related pages== *Star of Bethlehem *The Twelve Days of Christmas ==References== Category:Christian holidays Category:December observances Category:480s establishments
title: Holy Innocents' Day
